title: Are we going to keep pretending that lucian isnt broken?
body: just wondering so i can keep him permabanned.

replies.body:
Lucian is not actually broken. His winrate it at/below 50 and he is nowhere near the top for ADC picks.

Try learning how to play against him. He punishes out of position and bad last hitting pretty effectively.
He can burst tanks and squishies with only {{item:3153}}

> [{quoted}](name=VermillionWolf,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jiZt6Hu8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-02T20:16:53.909+0000)
>
> He can burst tanks and squishies with only {{item:3153}}

This ^. 

Only reason Lucian win rate is low is because people see how OP he is, try him, and end up feeding because they dont know how he works.

Also going by win rate on how strong a champion is is how the game got in the shitty state it is in currently.
